prompt: Create a demo website for a mobile company, use sample images
refinedPrompt: Design and develop a demo website for a mobile company, showcasing their latest smartphone models and key features. Include a visually appealing homepage with a hero section displaying the flagship device, along with sample images of the phones. Create dedicated product pages for each model, highlighting specifications, camera capabilities, and user reviews. Incorporate a responsive layout that adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes. Implement a sleek and modern design theme that aligns with the company's branding guidelines.
